public_pdfs.title: Module 1 : MDM - Fundamentals of Telecommunication Systems
public_pdfs.description: Complete coverage of telecommunication systems, including signal processing, modulation techniques, network protocols, and emerging technologies.

public_pdfs.title: Module 2 : MDM - Fundamentals of Telecommunication Systems
public_pdfs.description: Digital and analog communication, error correction, wireless technologies, and the future of telecommunications in a comprehensive guide.

public_pdfs.title: Module 3 : MDM - Fundamentals of Telecommunication Systems
public_pdfs.description: Cellular networks, satellite communication, network security, and the impact of 5G and beyond on global connectivity.

public_pdfs.title: Module 2 : Computational Theory
public_pdfs.description: Automata theory, formal languages, Turing machines, decidability, and complexity classes for a comprehensive understanding of computation.

public_pdfs.title: Module 3 : Computational Theory
public_pdfs.description: Advanced topics in computational theory, including NP-completeness, approximation algorithms, and the latest research in computational complexity.

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 1
premium_pdfs.description: Introduction to Python & its use cases, Python syntax & indentation

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 2
premium_pdfs.description: Arithmetic, relational, and logical operators, Assignment & membership operators, if, if-else, elif statements

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 3
premium_pdfs.description: for loop, while loop, range() function, Nested loops, break, continue, pass statements, Pattern printing (logic building)

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 4
premium_pdfs.description: String creation & indexing, Slicing, String methods, Formatted printing, Escape characters, Palindrome & anagram logic

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 5
premium_pdfs.description: Lists (creation, methods, slicing), Nested lists, Tuples & immutability, Sets & set operations, Differences between list, tuple, and set

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 6
premium_pdfs.description: Dictionary creation, Accessing & updating values, Dictionary methods, Nested dictionaries, Practical use cases (intro to JSON)

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 7
premium_pdfs.description: Defining & calling functions, Arguments (positional, keyword, default), Return values, Lambda functions, map(), filter(), reduce(), Recursion

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 8
premium_pdfs.description: Importing modules (import, from ... import), Built-in modules (math, random, datetime, os, sys, json), Creating and using simple custom modules, Packages basics (__init__.py) â€” concept only, File handling: open, read, write, append

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 9
premium_pdfs.description: Types of errors (Syntax, Runtime, Logical), try, except, else, finally blocks, Handling multiple exceptions, Best practices for error handling

premium_pdfs.title: Python Bootcamp - Day 10
premium_pdfs.description: Classes & objects, __init__ constructor, Instance vs class variables, Methods, Encapsulation, Inheritance, Polymorphism, Abstraction
